page.title: 13CHURCH FETE,SPARSHOLT.
page.content: The fete takes place in one of the big local houses every year to raise money for the church in Sparsholt.It has taken place annually for over 50 years. This year the Windband,from the School,played at the fete.There are lots of stalls that you can buy things from.At the coconut shy you have to knock coconuts off with a ball.The best stall is the bottle stall,it costs 10p to have a go and you have to put your hand into a box and pull out a cube.Some cubes are blank and some have numbers, if you get one of these you win a bottle of drink.There is also a lucky dip.
